column4: once i saw an app that mounts the media on the start-up(windows hard drive), well for dual boot users, this is really helpful since you don't have to mount it manually.. but unfortunately i forget the app name.. any clue?
aarh?? so what do we do to activate it?? just like startup boot file on windows??
daiton2345: anything to do with upgrade is safe
prepare for a backup, but i think 11.10 works better than 11.04
why not give gnome3 a shot???
